title: Pharm Logistic
subtitle: International Pharmaceutical Ordering Platform
description: Pharm Logistic is an online platform that connects customers in Uzbekistan with certified pharmaceutical products from international suppliers. The website provides a clear product catalog, transparent ordering process, and ensures delivery of authentic medicines directly to the country.
features: User-friendly product catalog with detailed descriptions
SEO-optimized for local and regional reach

title: Trivia Quiz App
subtitle: Interactive Trivia Game with Timer & Score
description: A fun and challenging trivia quiz web app where users can test their knowledge across different categories and difficulty levels. Features include real-time countdown, score tracking, answer review, and PWA support for installability.
features: Dynamic quiz generation with category, difficulty, and type filters
Timer-based gameplay with automatic score calculation
Results review with correct answers and explanations
Mobile-first responsive UI with dark mode
Installable as a Progressive Web App (PWA)
